title: Orange-Ginger Tofu Triangles
ingredients: ['450g firm tofu', '225ml (8 fl oz) fresh orange juice', '4 tablespoons rice vinegar', '5 tablespoons soy sauce', '5 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '4 teaspoons toasted sesame oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon minced root ginger', '1/4 teaspoon crushed chillies', '1 spring onion, cut into 2cm (1 in) strips', 'half a bunch fresh coriander, coarsely chopped']
